Package org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api

Everybody who wants to get access to the NetBeans Bugtracking functionality should be interested in APIs in this package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Issue
    Represents a bugtracking Issue.
    IssueQuickSearch
    Provides a UI Component to pick issues.
    Query
    Represents a bugtracking Query.
    Repository
    Represents a bugtracking Repository.
    RepositoryManager
    Manages registered Repository-s and related functionality.
    RepositoryQuery
    Find a bugtracking repository given by a file managed in the IDE.
    Util
    Bugtracking Utility methods.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Issue.Status
    Represents an Issue Status.
    IssueQuickSearch.RepositoryFilter
    Determines what kind of repositories should be shown in the repositories combo box.

Package org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api Description

Everybody who wants to get access to the NetBeans Bugtracking functionality should be interested in APIs in this package.
